name: File Structure to manage complex projects
description:
✏️ Updated for better readability


Just trying to work out a structure to manage and organize complex digital product designs in Figma (apps spanning multi-platforms – web, mobiles)


Key points to consider:

  • Maintaining different states and variations of each screen
  • Easier to follow a pattern to have some sense of context or relation between handed-off screens and actual designs (e.g. knowing where to trace back and locate the handed-off screen in the designs)
  • Synced with project management via story id/number


Any and all feedback/comments and suggestions are encouraged!
